OnBlurSupplier(pidSupplier="",strYKEY="",strYFELD="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Update supplier data and tax on blur of supplier field. ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 23-Mar-2010 shobby SR15753: Clean up redundant calls. ; 22-Mar-2006 JW SR13497: Fixed subscript error ; 30-Jan-2006 SteveS SR13497: Discount GL Account stuff ; 12-Aug-2005 JW SR12615: No need to clear supplier if not valid anymore. ; 05-Aug-2005 RPW SR12757: Don't populate invoice date ; 24-May-2005 shobby RemittanceAddress is now a calculated field (D26->M17) SR12319 ; 29-Apr-2005 JW SR12255: Changed from OnChange to OnBlur ; 8-Apr-2005 JW SR12098: Store location in YFELD ; 08-Mar-2005 JW Created (copied from FINAPInv) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objSupplier,idTerms,invoiceDate,dueDate,fltDisc,idControl new linesIncludeTax,idSupplier,idDiscAccount,numDiscount

// Tax fields set $$$FINAPInvTaxLocation(strYFELD)=$$GetTaxLocation^FINAPSupplier(pidSupplier) set $$$FINAPInvTaxInvoice(strYFELD )=$$$FINAPSupplierIssuesTaxInvoices(objSupplier) do PopulateTaxCodeCombo(pidSupplier,.strYFELD)
if $$$FINAPInvTaxInvoice(strYFELD) { set linesIncludeTax = $$$FINAPSupplierInvoiceLinesContainTax(objSupplier) } else { set linesIncludeTax = $$$NO } set $$$FINAPInvLinesIncludeTax(strYFELD) = linesIncludeTax

; Address do UpdateHeaderField^COMGridEdit31Interface("M17",$$UpdateAddress^FINAPInv(pidSupplier))
; Terms set idTerms = $$GetTerm^FINAPSupplier(pidSupplier) set $$$FINAPInvDiscountTerm(strYFELD)= idTerms
; Discount GL Account set idDiscAccount=$$$FINAPSupplierDiscountGLAccount(objSupplier) if (idDiscAccount="") { set idControl=$$$FINAPSupplierControlAccount(objSupplier) if (idControl'="") set idDiscAccount=$$$FINAPAccountDiscountAccount($get(^FINAPAccount(YM,idControl,1))) } set $$$FINAPInvDiscountGLAccount(strYFELD)=idDiscAccount
set numDiscount = 0 if idTerms'="" { set numDiscount = $$$FINSYSTermDiscount1($get(^FINSYSTerm(YM,idTerms,1))) } set $$$FINAPInvDiscountPercent(strYFELD)=numDiscount } } quit

// Tax checkboxes if (pField=$$$FldFINAPInvLinesIncludeTax)||(pField=$$$FldFINAPInvTaxInvoice) { ; Update clicked field
set YFELD = $$GetFormData^COMUtilForm() set $piece(YFELD,Y,pField) = pValue
; Update other field if necessary if (pField=$$$FldFINAPInvLinesIncludeTax)&&pValue { do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,$$$FldFINAPInvTaxInvoice,$$$YES,,.YFELD)
} elseif (pField=$$$FldFINAPInvTaxInvoice)&&'pValue { do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,$$$FldFINAPInvLinesIncludeTax,$$$NO,,.YFELD)
// clear tax code field do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,$$$FldFINAPInvDefaultTaxCode,"") } do UpdateTaxFields(YFELD,$$$YES) do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,43,$$TaxAppliedTo^FINAPInv($$GetFormData^COMUtilForm(,"P"),YFELD),"M")
} else { // Repeat field - if not checked, make others readonly. do ToggleReadOnly^COMUtilForm("36;37;38",'pValue) if 'pValue { do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,$$$FldFINAPInvRepeatStartDate,"",,,$$$NO) do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,$$$FldFINAPInvRepeatEndDate,"",,,$$$NO) do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,$$$FldFINAPInvRepeatGroup,"",,,$$$NO) } } quit
UpdateTaxFields(pYFELD,blnTaxChanged=$$$NO) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Updates tax information. ; ; Params: pYFELD - current version of YFELD ; blnTaxChanged - do the lines' taxes need to be recalculated? ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Mar-2005 JW Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new linesIncludeTax,taxInvoice,blnTaxInc
set linesIncludeTax = $$$FINAPInvLinesIncludeTax(pYFELD) set taxInvoice = $$$FINAPInvTaxInvoice(pYFELD)
// Hide tax columns depending on checkboxes. $$$GRIDHideShowColumns("5;2;1;7",'taxInvoice_";"_+linesIncludeTax_";"_'linesIncludeTax)
// Make tax field read only if not tax invoice or tax on lines if $$Editable^FINSYSReview("FINAPInv",$$$FINAPInvStatus(pYFELD)) { do ToggleReadOnly^COMUtilForm($$$FldFINAPInvTaxTotal,linesIncludeTax||'taxInvoice,"FINAPVoucher") do ToggleReadOnly^COMUtilForm($$$FldFINAPInvDefaultTaxCode,'taxInvoice,"FINAPVoucher") }
if blnTaxChanged { do RecalculateTaxes(pYFELD) } quit
RecalculateTaxes(pobjInvoice="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Recalculate the taxes on each line. ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Apr-2010 GRF SR17177: arrGrid rather than objGrid; GRID Macros ; 08-Mar-2005 JW Created (copied from FINARInv) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new arrGrid,idInvoice,idLine,lineAmount,objInvLine,totalTax,subTotal new defaultTaxCode,itemTaxCode
$$$GRIDGetContents(.arrGrid) set totalTax = 0 set subTotal = 0
set idInvoice = $order(arrGrid("")) if idInvoice'="" { set defaultTaxCode = $$$FINAPInvDefaultTaxCode(pobjInvoice)
set idLine = "" for { set idLine = $order(arrGrid(idInvoice,idLine)) quit:idLine=""
set objInvLine = $get(arrGrid(idInvoice,idLine))
set itemTaxCode = $$$FINAPInvChargeTaxCode(objInvLine) if (itemTaxCode'="") && ($data(^COMTempList(YM,YUSER,"TaxCodes",itemTaxCode,1))#2=0) { set $$$FINAPInvChargeTaxCode(objInvLine) = defaultTaxCode }
do CalculateTax^FINAPInvCharge(.objInvLine,pobjInvoice)
set arrGrid(idInvoice,idLine) = objInvLine if '$$$FINAPInvChargeIsOnCharge(objInvLine) { set totalTax = $$$FCAdd(totalTax,$$$FINAPInvChargeTax(objInvLine)) set subTotal = $$$FCAdd(subTotal,$$$FINAPInvChargeAmountTaxEx(objInvLine)) } } } $$$GRIDSetContents(.arrGrid)
// Update header fields do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,11,subTotal,"M") do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,$$$FldFINAPInvTaxTotal,totalTax) do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,10,$$$FCAdd(totalTax,subTotal),"M")
quit
DisplayChildren(pidInvoice) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Routine to display all child invoices of a parent in a COM table. ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 27-Sep-2005 shobby SR13213:New field that displays the number of children for a Repeat Voucher ; where the posting has been cancelled. The 'Children Posted' figure now ; excludes the 'Cancelled' children. ; 15-Mar-2005 JW Created (Copied from FINARInvChild) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idxInvoice,lstHeader,idChild,objChild,dtePosted,numChildren,idSupplier,strSupplier new total,tax,charges,onCharges,TOTALCharges,TOTALonCharges,TOTALtax,numCancelled
quit:$get(pidInvoice)=""
set idxInvoice=$$$Index(pidInvoice) set numChildren = 0 set numCancelled= 0
if $data(^FINAPInvs(YM,3,idxInvoice)) {
set TOTALCharges = 0 set TOTALonCharges = 0 set TOTALtax = 0
set lstHeader=$listbuild($$$Text("Fin00595"), ;Child Invoice $$$StrFINAPInvPostedDate, ;Posted Date $$$StrFINAPInvSupplier, ;Supplier $$$Text("Fin00609"), ;Sub Total $$$StrFINAPInvTaxTotal, ;Total Tax $$$Text("Fin00071"), ;Total $$$Text("Fin00700")) ;On Charges
do Start^COMTable(lstHeader)
set idChild="" for { set idChild=$order(^FINAPInvs(YM,3,idxInvoice,idChild)) quit:idChild=""
set objChild=$get(^FINAPInv(YM,idChild,1))
set total = $$SumTotals(idChild,.charges,.onCharges,.tax)
do NewLine^COMTable()
; CHILD INVOICE CELL do InsertCell^COMTable(idChild,"FINAPVoucher",idChild,"","",1)
; POSTED DATE CELL set dtePosted=$$$FINAPInvPostedDate(objChild) if dtePosted="" { do InsertCell^COMTable($$GetEnumDescription^COMUtils("FINSYSSTATUS",$$$FINAPInvStatus(objChild))) } else { do InsertCell^COMTable($$^WWWDATE(dtePosted)) }
; SUPPLIER NUMBER CELL set idSupplier=$$$FINAPInvInvoiceSupplier(objChild) set strSupplier=$$$FINAPSupplierSupplierName($get(^FINAPSupplier(YM,idSupplier,1))) do InsertCell^COMTable(idSupplier_" ("_strSupplier_")","FINAPSupplier",idSupplier)
; TOTAL CELLS do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(charges) do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(tax) do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(total) do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(onCharges)
do EndLine^COMTable()
if ($$$FINAPInvStatus(objChild)=$$$EnumFINSYSSTATUSCancelled)||($$$FINAPInvStatus(objChild)=$$$EnumFINSYSSTATUSCancelled) { set numCancelled=numCancelled+1 ;SR13213 } else { set numChildren = numChildren+1 } set TOTALCharges = TOTALCharges+charges set TOTALonCharges = TOTALonCharges+onCharges set TOTALtax = TOTALtax+tax }
; TOTAL ROW do NewLine^COMTable(YDARKGRAY) do InsertCell^COMTable("<B>"_$$$Text("Fin00427")_":",,,,"CENTER",,3) ;Totals do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(TOTALCharges) do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(TOTALtax) do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(TOTALCharges+TOTALtax) do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable(TOTALonCharges) do EndLine^COMTable()
do Stop^COMTable() }
write "<script>" do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,28,numChildren,"M") do PopulateDataField^COMUtils(YFORM,52,numCancelled,"M") ;SR13213 write "</script>"
quit
SumTotals(pidInvoice,pSubTotal,pOnCharges,pTax) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Sum the voucher amounts from globals ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 15-Mar-2005 JW Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idFINAPInvLine,objFINAPInvLine,objFINAPInv
set pSubTotal = 0 set pOnCharges = 0 set pTax = 0
if $get(pidInvoice)'="" { set idFINAPInvLine="" for { set idFINAPInvLine=$order(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idFINAPInvLine)) quit:idFINAPInvLine=""
set objFINAPInvLine=$get(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idFINAPInvLine,1)) if $$$FINAPInvChargeIsOnCharge(objFINAPInvLine) { set pOnCharges = $$$FCAdd(pOnCharges,$$$FINAPInvChargeAmountTaxEx(objFINAPInvLine)) } else { set pSubTotal = $$$FCAdd(pSubTotal,$$$FINAPInvChargeAmountTaxEx(objFINAPInvLine)) } } set objFINAPInv = $get(^FINAPInv(YM,pidInvoice,1)) set pTax = $$$FINAPInvTaxTotal(objFINAPInv) } quit $$$FCAdd(pSubTotal,pTax)
MakeChildInvoice(pidInvoice,pobjInvoice="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; When posting a repeat (parent) invoice, this will create the child invoice record. ; ; Params: pidInvoice - invoice id (returns as child id) ; pobjInvoice - invoice data (returns updated with parent id) ; ; Returns: strStatus ; ; History: ; 3-Nov-2005 JW Remove batch number from parent and save ; 05-Sep-2005 PO SR13026: When saving a child invoice do not include repeat details ; 15-Mar-2005 JW Created (copied from FINARInvPost) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idChildInvoice,objChildInvoice,strStatus new idLine,objLine,idDivision,objDivision
quit:$get(pidInvoice)=""
;*************************************** tstart ;***************************************
set objChildInvoice = pobjInvoice
// Remove batch number from parent and Save set $$$FINAPInvBatchNumber(pobjInvoice) = "" set strStatus=$$$Save("FINAPInv",pidInvoice,pobjInvoice,1)
if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { set idChildInvoice=$$^WWWNEXT("FINAPInv") set $$$FINAPInvParentInvoice(objChildInvoice)=pidInvoice set $$$FINAPInvSuppliersInvoiceNumber(objChildInvoice)=idChildInvoice
// Update Dates set $$$FINAPInvInvoiceDate(objChildInvoice) = +$horolog set $$$FINAPInvDueDate(objChildInvoice) = $$GetDueDate^FINAPSupplier($$$FINAPInvInvoiceSupplier(pobjInvoice),+$horolog,$$$FINAPInvDiscountTerm(pobjInvoice))
;Exclude repeat group details set $$$FINAPInvRepeat(objChildInvoice) = "" set $$$FINAPInvRepeatGroup(objChildInvoice) = "" set $$$FINAPInvRepeatStartDate(objChildInvoice) = "" set $$$FINAPInvRepeatEndDate(objChildInvoice) = ""
// Save Child set strStatus=$$$Save("FINAPInv",idChildInvoice,objChildInvoice,1)
if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { set idLine="" for { set idLine=$order(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idLine)) quit:idLine=""
// Copy Lines set objLine=$get(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idLine,1))
set strStatus=$$$Save("FINAPInvCharge",idChildInvoice_","_idLine,objLine,1) quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus)
set idDivision="" for { set idDivision=$order(^FINAPInvChargeDivision(YM,pidInvoice,idLine,idDivision)) quit:idDivision=""
// Copy Divisions set objDivision=$get(^FINAPInvChargeDivision(YM,pidInvoice,idLine,idDivision,1)) set strStatus=$$$Save("FINAPInvChargeDivision",idChildInvoice_","_idLine_","_idDivision,objDivision,1) quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus) } quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus) } } } ;*************************************** if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { set pidInvoice = idChildInvoice // Return child id and record set pobjInvoice = objChildInvoice if $tlevel>0 tcommit } else { trollback } ;*************************************** quit strStatus
GetDefaultTaxCode() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Get the default tax code ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 30-Mar-2005 JW Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objInv
set objInv = $$$GRIDYFELDContainer quit $$$FINAPInvDefaultTaxCode(objInv)
ConsistentTax(pidInvoice) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; If the tax total isn't zero, then one of the lines must be taxable. ; ; Returns: bln whether above holds true. ; ; History: ; 21-Mar-2005 JW Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnConsistent,objInvoice,objCharge,idLine,taxLoc,transDate,taxCode
set blnConsistent = $$$NO
if $get(pidInvoice)'="" { set objInvoice=$get(^FINAPInv(YM,pidInvoice,1))
if $$$FCZero($$$FINAPInvTaxTotal(objInvoice)) || $$$FINAPInvLinesIncludeTax(objInvoice) { set blnConsistent = $$$YES } else { set taxLoc = $$$FINAPInvTaxLocation(objInvoice) set transDate = $$$FINAPInvEnteredDate(objInvoice)
set idLine = "" for { set idLine=$order(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idLine)) quit:idLine=""
set objCharge=$get(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idLine,1))
set taxCode = $$$FINAPInvChargeTaxCode(objCharge)
if '$$$FINAPInvChargeIsOnCharge(objCharge) { if ($$CombinedTaxRate^COMTAX(taxCode,taxLoc,transDate) > 0) { set blnConsistent = $$$YES } } quit:blnConsistent } } } quit blnConsistent
NumChildrenPostedToday(pidInvoice,pDatePosted="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Given an invoice ID, does this invoice have any children posted today? ; ; ; Parameters: - pidInvoice: The id of the parent invoice. ; - pDatePosted: Check for children posted on this day (defaults to $H) ; ; Returns: num children posted today ; ; History: ; 21-Mar-2005 JW Created (copied from FINARInv) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new numChildren,objInvoice,idParentInvoice,idChildInvoice,objChildInvoice set numChildren=0 if pDatePosted="" set pDatePosted=+$H
if $get(pidInvoice)'="" { set objInvoice=$get(^FINAPInv(YM,pidInvoice,1)) if $$$FINAPInvRepeat(objInvoice) { set idParentInvoice=$$$Index(pidInvoice)
set idChildInvoice="" for { set idChildInvoice=$order(^FINAPInvs(YM,3,idParentInvoice,idChildInvoice)) quit:idChildInvoice=""
set objChildInvoice=$get(^FINAPInv(YM,idChildInvoice,1)) if $$$FINAPInvPostedDate(objChildInvoice)=pDatePosted { set numChildren=numChildren+1 } } } } quit numChildren
PostWarnings(pidInvoice,pblnChildren,pblnTax) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Return a warning if this invoice already has children posted today, or tax ; total is different to sum of line taxes. ; ; Returns: warning ; ; History: ; 21-Mar-2005 JW Created (Copied from FINARInv) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intChildrenToday,strWarning,taxTotal,taxSum,objSettings,objInvoice,idLine new objCharge
set strWarning = "" set pblnChildren = $$$NO set pblnTax = $$$NO
if ($get(pidInvoice)'="") {
set objSettings=$get(^FINGeneralSetup(YM,YM,1)) if $$$FINGeneralSetupWarnonsamedaypostingAP(objSettings) {
set intChildrenToday=$$NumChildrenPostedToday(pidInvoice) if (intChildrenToday>0) { if (intChildrenToday=1) { set strWarning=$$$Text($lb("Fin00600")) ;This invoice already has a child invoice posted today. Proceed with posting? } else { set strWarning=$$$Text($lb("Fin00601",intChildrenToday)) ;This invoice already has %1 child invoices posted today. Proceed with posting? } set pblnChildren=$$$YES } }
// Check tax set objInvoice = $get(^FINAPInv(YM,pidInvoice,1)) if '$$$FINAPInvLinesIncludeTax(objInvoice) { set taxSum=0 set idLine = "" for { set idLine=$order(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idLine)) quit:idLine=""
set objCharge=$get(^FINAPInvCharge(YM,pidInvoice,idLine,1)) if '$$$FINAPInvChargeIsOnCharge(objCharge) { set taxSum = $$$FCAdd(taxSum,$$$FINAPInvChargeTax(objCharge)) } } set taxTotal = $$$FINAPInvTaxTotal(objInvoice) if '$$$FCZero($$$FCSub(taxTotal,taxSum)) { if strWarning'="" set strWarning = strWarning_"\n"_$$$Text("Fin00708")_": " ; "Also" set strWarning = strWarning_$$$Text($listbuild("Fin00707",$$FormatCurrency^COMTable(taxTotal),$$FormatCurrency^COMTable(taxSum))) set pblnTax = $$$YES } ; "The total tax entered (%1) is not equal to the sum of the line taxes (%2). Proceed with posting?" } } quit strWarning

ValidRepeatData(pidInvoice) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check repeat data for posting today ; ; Returns: status ; ; History: ; 12-Apr-2005 JW Created (copied from FINARInv) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strStatus,objInvoice,today,endDate
set strStatus = $$$OK
if $get(pidInvoice)'="" { set objInvoice = $get(^FINAPInv(YM,pidInvoice,1))
if $$$FINAPInvRepeat(objInvoice) { set today = +$horolog set endDate = $$$FINAPInvRepeatEndDate(objInvoice)
if $$$FINAPInvRepeatGroup(objInvoice)="" { set strStatus="Fin00571" ; "Must specify a Repeat Group."
} elseif $$$FINAPInvRepeatStartDate(objInvoice) > today { set strStatus=$lb("Fin00578",pidInvoice) ; "Repeat Start Date for invoice '%1' has not arrived yet."
} elseif (endDate'="")&&(endDate<today) { set strStatus=$lb("Fin00734",pidInvoice) ; "Repeat End Date for invoice '%1' has elapsed." } } } quit strStatus
